description: Smallest denominator d such that the Sylvester expansion of n/d has n terms.
references: H. T. Freitag and G. M. Phillips, Sylvester's algorithm and Fibonacci numbers, in Applications of Fibonacci numbers, Vol. 8 (Rochester, NY, 1998), 155-163, Kluwer Acad. Publ., Dordrecht, 1999.
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_, Jul 04 2000
